text: Sérgio Filipe Grilo das Neves, known as Sérgio Grilo (born 17 February 1983) is a Portuguese football player and coach who plays for Naval. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Naval on 10 December 2000 in a game against Marco. ==Personal== He is the older brother of Paulo Grilo. ==References== ==External links== Category:1983 births Category:People from Figueira da Foz Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Associação Naval 1º de Maio players Category:LigaPro players Category:U.D. title: Sérgio Grilo
